verses.roman:
advaita-śrīvāsādi yata bhakta-gaṇa
sabei āsibe śuni' prabhura āgamana

synonyms: advaita—Advaita Prabhu; śrīvāsa-ādi—and all the devotees like Śrīvāsa; yata—all; bhakta-gaṇa—devotees; sabei—all; āsibe—will come; śuni'—hearing; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āgamana—arrival.
translation: "After hearing news of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's arrival, devotees like Advaita and Śrīvāsa will certainly come to see Him.
